# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/restify`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for restify (https://github.com/restify/node-restify).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/restify

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Tue, 15 May 2018 21:28:51 GMT
 * Dependencies: http, https, bunyan, url, spdy, stream, node
 * Global values: none
